mapper.insert: insert into emp2(empno, ename, sal) values(#{empno},#{ename},#{sal})
mapper.select: select board_id, title, writer, content, regdate, hit from emp2 order by board_id desc
select board_id, title, writer, content, regdate, hit from emp2 where board_id=#{board_id}
mapper.update: update emp2 set title=#{title}, writer=#{writer}, content=#{content} where board_id=#{board_id}
